scripts.//: Default start points to start:safe to keep CI stable and avoid OOM (exit 137). Use start:ultralowmem or ci:serve-static for extreme constraints.
scripts.start: node -e "const {spawn}=require('child_process');const run=(cmd,args=[])=>spawn(cmd,args,{stdio:'inherit'});const useStatic=process.env.CI_STATIC_ONLY==='1';const ready=()=>setTimeout(()=>console.log('[start] READY'),800);const prep=run('node',['./scripts/prestart-prepare.js']);prep.on('exit',()=>{if(useStatic){run('npm',['run','start:static:safe']);run('npm',['run','ci:health']);ready();return;}const child=run('npm',['run','start:safe']);let fellBack=false;let staticProc=null;const fallback=()=>{if(fellBack)return;fellBack=true;console.log('[start] Falling back to static server for stability');staticProc=run('npm',['run','start:static:safe']);run('npm',['run','ci:health']);ready();};child.on('exit',(code,signal)=>{if(code!==0||signal){console.log('[start] child exited',{code,signal});fallback();}else{console.log('[start] child exited cleanly');}});child.on('error',fallback);const shutdown=(sig)=>{try{child&&child.pid&&child.kill(sig||'SIGTERM');}catch(_){}try{staticProc&&staticProc.pid&&staticProc.kill(sig||'SIGTERM');}catch(_){}setTimeout(()=>process.exit(0),400).unref();};process.on('SIGTERM',()=>shutdown('SIGTERM'));process.on('SIGINT',()=>shutdown('SIGINT'));setInterval(()=>{},60000);});"
